new_headline: We Ran the Numbers: Agoda vs Airbnb in Melaka - Which Platform Pays More?

old_headline: Airbnb vs Booking.com vs Agoda: Which Platform Wins in Melaka? (2026)
new_headline: Airbnb vs Booking.com vs Agoda: Melaka 2026 Earnings Comparison
hypothesis: Searchers comparing platforms are ultimately interested in 'earnings'. Switching from the vague 'Which Platform Wins' to the benefit-driven 'Earnings Comparison' targets that intent. Matches common search patterns like 'airbnb vs agoda earnings'.
notes: SEO Brain Experiment Runner - iHousing rotation. Targeting revenue-focused comparison intent.

old_headline: How Much Can You Really Make from Airbnb in Melaka? (Real Numbers)
new_headline: Melaka Airbnb Income: Real Monthly Earnings for 2026 (100+ Properties)
hypothesis: The phrase 'Real Monthly Earnings' and '100+ Properties' provides specific proof and time relevance (2026). This should significantly outperform the more generic 'How Much Can You Really Make' in terms of CTR.
notes: SEO Brain Experiment Runner - iHousing rotation. Emphasizing data scale and timeframe.

old_headline: Do You Need a MOTAC License for Airbnb in Malaysia? The Real Answer
new_headline: MOTAC License for Airbnb Malaysia 2026: Is it Mandatory?
hypothesis: Page has 25 impressions (top opportunity) but low CTR. 1) '2026' in headline targets fresh intent. 2) Adding TL;DR box and FAQ section at top addresses 'Build In Public' finding that users want immediate answers. 3) FAQ structure targets 'is it mandatory' long-tail queries. 4) Title matches search intent better than 'The Real Answer'.
notes: SEO Brain Experiment Runner - iHousing rotation. Integrated headline optimization with above-fold content alignment and FAQ schema.
